comments.body: Interesting but not awful that we lose the line `Type 'A & B' is not assignable to type 'D'.`... and itâ€™s nice that we get the elaboration into the missing properties.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +120,124 @@!!! error TS2322:   Type 'A & B' is not assignable to type 'B & D'.
!!! error TS2322:     Property 'd' is missing in type 'A & B' but required in type 'D'.
!!! related TS2728 tests/cases/conformance/types/intersection/intersectionAndUnionTypes.ts:4:15: 'd' is declared here.
    y = aob;
    ~
